content: Alright, I think we need to revise the message to him that if he wants to do this, do the minimum amount this year to set him up for an AI and gladiator training summer (I’ve told him that football players are gladiators and that gladiators are one of the only professions that ai and robots won’t be able to replace, do you agree that humans will always love humans playing blood sports?). That we need to start now with assessing his current knowledge to make sure he meets the pre reqs to blow testing out of the water in 10 weeks. And then Idint care about his grades and punish him if he stays on your track because your track is the one that leads to success. Not the one developed by teachers unions.
